Дякуємо за розуміння!

column.name: body_eng
column.value: Unfortunately, your bags contained the following: ${violationDescription} (order №${orderNumber}). This is the type of waste we do not collect. Please familiarize yourself with our recycling rules once more: https://bit.ly/2Q2esLB We do NOT collect any type of the following waste:-batteries, accumulators (lead-acid batteries), mercury-containing (fluorescent) light bulbs and thermometers; -medicine and pharmaceutical waste (masks, gloves, syringes), and anything that came into contact with bodily fluids (blood, urine, saliva, bodily secretions); -personal hygiene and contraception items that have been used (diapers, pads, tampons, condoms, etc.); -printer cartridges; -construction waste, varnish, paint, plasticine; -cigarette butts/e-cigarettes and their accessories; -gas cylinders, lighters, explosive materials (shell casings, ammunition, etc.); -ceramics; -sharp and cutting objects. Thank you for your understanding!
